```scss
// Property: effect
// Description: The effect you provide for the view.
// Component(s): Ti.UI.iOS.BlurView
'.effect-blur-style-extra-light[platform=ios]': { effect: Ti.UI.iOS.BLUR_EFFECT_STYLE_EXTRA_LIGHT }
'.effect-blur-style-light[platform=ios]': { effect: Ti.UI.iOS.BLUR_EFFECT_STYLE_LIGHT }
'.effect-blur-style-dark[platform=ios]': { effect: Ti.UI.iOS.BLUR_EFFECT_STYLE_DARK }
'.effect-blur-style-regular[platform=ios]': { effect: Ti.UI.iOS.BLUR_EFFECT_STYLE_REGULAR }
'.effect-blur-style-prominent[platform=ios]': { effect: Ti.UI.iOS.BLUR_EFFECT_STYLE_PROMINENT }
'.effect-blur-style-system-ultra-thin-material[platform=ios]': { effect: Ti.UI.iOS.BLUR_EFFECT_STYLE_SYSTEM_ULTRA_THIN_MATERIAL }
'.effect-blur-style-system-thin-material[platform=ios]': { effect: Ti.UI.iOS.BLUR_EFFECT_STYLE_SYSTEM_THIN_MATERIAL }
'.effect-blur-style-system-material[platform=ios]': { effect: Ti.UI.iOS.BLUR_EFFECT_STYLE_SYSTEM_MATERIAL }
'.effect-blur-style-system-thick-material[platform=ios]': { effect: Ti.UI.iOS.BLUR_EFFECT_STYLE_SYSTEM_THICK_MATERIAL }
'.effect-blur-style-system-chrome-material[platform=ios]': { effect: Ti.UI.iOS.BLUR_EFFECT_STYLE_SYSTEM_CHROME_MATERIAL }
'.effect-blur-style-system-ultra-thin-material-light[platform=ios]': { effect: Ti.UI.iOS.BLUR_EFFECT_STYLE_SYSTEM_ULTRA_THIN_MATERIAL_LIGHT }
'.effect-blur-style-system-thin-material-light[platform=ios]': { effect: Ti.UI.iOS.BLUR_EFFECT_STYLE_SYSTEM_THIN_MATERIAL_LIGHT }
'.effect-blur-style-system-material-light[platform=ios]': { effect: Ti.UI.iOS.BLUR_EFFECT_STYLE_SYSTEM_MATERIAL_LIGHT }
'.effect-blur-style-system-thick-material-light[platform=ios]': { effect: Ti.UI.iOS.BLUR_EFFECT_STYLE_SYSTEM_THICK_MATERIAL_LIGHT }
'.effect-blur-style-system-chrome-material-light[platform=ios]': { effect: Ti.UI.iOS.BLUR_EFFECT_STYLE_SYSTEM_CHROME_MATERIAL_LIGHT }
'.effect-blur-style-system-ultra-thin-material-dark[platform=ios]': { effect: Ti.UI.iOS.BLUR_EFFECT_STYLE_SYSTEM_ULTRA_THIN_MATERIAL_DARK }
'.effect-blur-style-system-thin-material-dark[platform=ios]': { effect: Ti.UI.iOS.BLUR_EFFECT_STYLE_SYSTEM_THIN_MATERIAL_DARK }
'.effect-blur-style-system-material-dark[platform=ios]': { effect: Ti.UI.iOS.BLUR_EFFECT_STYLE_SYSTEM_MATERIAL_DARK }
'.effect-blur-style-system-thick-material-dark[platform=ios]': { effect: Ti.UI.iOS.BLUR_EFFECT_STYLE_SYSTEM_THICK_MATERIAL_DARK }
'.effect-blur-style-system-chrome-material-dark[platform=ios]': { effect: Ti.UI.iOS.BLUR_EFFECT_STYLE_SYSTEM_CHROME_MATERIAL_DARK }
```
